item.title: Ukrainian Drone Attack Forces Restriction of Flights Near Moscow, Russia Says
item.description: The volley comes just days before a planned parade in the capital to mark the 80th anniversary of the end of World War II in Europe.

item.title: I Was Failing at Work and Motherhood. Then I Met Joan Darling.
item.description: “For the first time since having my kids, I felt like a whole person.”

item.title: Trump’s Third-Term Musings Are Part of a Pattern
item.description: The president’s fantasizing about remaining in office deserves more forceful pushback.

item.title: Locals in Pakistani Kashmir Fear Being the First to Face India’s Ire
item.description: Many in the region are preparing for a possible military confrontation between India and Pakistan because of a terrorist attack two weeks ago.
